net.proteusframework.core.html

Class EntityUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.proteusframework.core.html.EntityUtil

  • public final class EntityUtil
extends Object
    Entity encoding utility for HTML and XHTML characters.
    Author:
    Russ Tennant (russ@i2rd.com)

      • escapeForPersistence

        @Nullable
@Contract(value="null->null;!null->!null")
public static String escapeForPersistence(String characters)
        Escape XML for persistence purposes. Basically, this escapes ampersands for element enclosures. This will not double escape ampersands and ignores common HTML entities, you must make sure you handle those entities when you parse your document fragments.
        Parameters:
        characters - the input.
        Returns:
        String.

      • escapeForXMLParsing

        @Nullable
@Contract(value="null->null;!null->!null")
public static String escapeForXMLParsing(CharSequence characters)
        Escape XML for persistence purposes. Basically, this escapes ampersands for element enclosures. This will not double escape ampersands and ignores common HTML entities, you must make sure you handle those entities when you parse your document fragments.
        Parameters:
        characters - the input. May be null.
        Returns:
        the escaped characters or null if null was specified.

      • escapeForXMLParsing

        @Nullable
@Contract(value="null,_->null;!null,_->!null")
public static String escapeForXMLParsing(CharSequence characters,
                                           boolean skipKnownEntities)
        Escape XML for persistence purposes. Basically, this escapes ampersands for element enclosures. This will not double double escape ampersands and can be configured to ignore known HTML entities, in which case you must make sure you handle those entities when you parse your XML content.
        Parameters:
        characters - the input. May be null.
        skipKnownEntities - flag to skip known entities that are not element enclosures.
        Returns:
        the escaped characters or null if null was specified.

      • escapeForXMLRendering

        @Nullable
@Contract(value="null->null;!null->!null")
public static String escapeForXMLRendering(CharSequence characters)
        Escape XML for rendering to an XML capable application.
        Parameters:
        characters - the characters.
        Returns:
        the escaped characters or null if null was specified.

      • getInstance

        public static EntityUtil getInstance(EnumSet<EntityUtil.EscapeType> types)

      • getInstance

        Returns:
        the util.

      • getInstanceForUnicodeAttributes

        public static EntityUtil getInstanceForUnicodeAttributes()
        Get an instance for use within an XML/XHTML attribute. NOTE: this doesn't escape the single quote (&apos;). It is expected that you are quoting the attribute with a double quote or are escaping the single quote yourself.
        Returns:
        the instance.

      • getInstanceForUnicodeCDATA

        public static EntityUtil getInstanceForUnicodeCDATA()
        Get an instance for use within a CDATA block.
        Returns:
        the instance.

      • getInstanceForUnicodeHTML

        public static EntityUtil getInstanceForUnicodeHTML()
        Get an instance for use within HTML elements.
        Returns:
        the instance.

      • getInstanceForUnicodeHTMLTextArea

        public static EntityUtil getInstanceForUnicodeHTMLTextArea()
        Get an instance for use within a textarea HTML element.

        NOTE: this should only be used for rendering. Do not use to escape content for persistence since it is easy to escape characters multiple times. Instead use escapeForPersistence(String) which will only escape & once.

        Returns:
        the instance.
